==Tutorial==

{{Tutorial
|image1 = Tutorial Elemental Trial Melt 1.png
|text1  = When {{Pyro}} meets {{Cryo}}, Melt occurs. Melt causes the triggering source of {{Pyro}} or {{Cryo}} DMG to receive a certain DMG Bonus. If the triggering DMG type is {{Pyro}}, it will receive a greater DMG Bonus than {{Cryo}}.
|image2 = Tutorial Elemental Trial Melt 2.png
|image3 = Tutorial Elemental Trial Melt 3.png
|text2  = Use {{Cryo}} attacks in battle to infuse opponents with {{Cryo}}. Then, switch to a {{Pyro}} character and use {{Pyro}} attacks to trigger Melt and increase the DMG dealt to defeat your opponents swiftly!
}}
